mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.customer_id AS "customerId", a.fund_account AS "fundAccount", a.coupon_template AS "couponTemplate", a.coupon_code AS "couponCode", a.create_time AS "createTime"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_coupon_recieve( user_id, customer_id, fund_account, coupon_template, coupon_code, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{customerId}, #{fundAccount}, #{couponTemplate}, #{couponCode}, #{createTime} )
